I bought this for my wife on whim. She was very happy to have both of these movies in one set..even if the sequel is not as good as the original. I was okay with price considering these have not been remastered and are in full-screen aspect ratio. However, I would have paid twice the price for a remastered version. Great movies. Each movie is on a separate disc in this set.
thanks great job

Arthur and Arthur 2 on the rocks are a couple of our favorites. Dudley Moore is great in both of them. Lisa Minnelli too. Happy to find it here. If you like a good comedy, you will like Arthur!
I love this movie. I'm glad there was an Arthur2.  it was hilarious. I have to buy another one for my friend. she love Arthur as well.
Looked for this a long time video stores didn't have it.

Get ready to laugh!!  Arthur is a fun Cinderella story.  Down-to-earth as well as heart-warming, Arthur shows that people from different background can certainly come together.  When you need a dose of laughter, Arthur is certainly the right medicine that will brighten your mood.
As advertised
Its great

Two of the funniest movies ever! Glad to have them in my collection!
Arrived early, great condition. Great movies for a great price.
Great movie, great service on this web site
very funny got it fast
Two of my favorite movies!  They never get old and my nieces and I watch them over and over!
Dudley Moore is a very good actor - he played his roll very well and very believable. Liza Minnelli was also very good in her roll. Both movies were very  entertaining.
I got this because it has both  movies 1 and 2 on it. Both are great, funny and sad situations

Dudley Moore at his irresistible best!  I (thankfully) never saw the recent remake of "Arthur"...which I'm sure couldn't hold a shot glass to this original.  The comment from Arthur's father calling him a "millionaire drunk playboy" tells it all, but to me the movie belongs to Sir John Gielgud in the role of Arthur's "servant" Hobson.  Some of the best lines are delivered by Sir John, and I won't spoil the surprise by quoting them here.
"Arthur 2 On the Rocks" is an OK sequel, but doesn't carry the weight of the first.
Packaging was great and delivered prior to the original promised date.  I highly recommend this!!
For anyone who needs a good laugh!!!!  It also puts you on a roller coaster ride of emotions as Dudley is having to face the facts of trying to "Grow UP". It is well worth a re-watch.
I remember these movies from many years ago.  Can't go wrong with Dudley Moore and Liza Minnelli.  Wanted to share the laughter with my grandchildren.  To show them what good movies are.

I remember Arthur being much more fun, the laughs a lot quicker, Dudley Moores character laugh being less annoying.  Nothings as good as the memory of it...I never liked the sequel, it was never funny to me, the only reason I bought it was that by buying the two, the package was cheaper than buying Arthur by itself.  I still enjoyed it, a nice meandering stroll down memory lane, but it isn't the movie I'd watch over and over-like Caddyshack, I could watch that all day long!
Great movie I have watched it over and over and to have both dvd's together is wonderful a great watch and a great price

I just love these movies! Great feel good, funny, laugh a minute movie to just curl up on the couch and laugh at. Dudley Moore plays a hilarious drunk. I never get sick of hearing, "He's taking the knife outta the cheese, you think he wants some cheese"? Love, love, love, the butler in "Arthur". Dudley and Liza are the perfect pair!
I love this movie!!!!!!! I have seen it so much, and it makes me laugh every time. I love the actors-actresses very classy!!!!! I just had to have it. Once again thank you so much !!!!!
This movie keeps freezing up, not in good condition at all.  Not even useable.  Very unhappy.  I am going to have to buy another one now.

I couldn't believe I found this one!  Amazon has such an amazing collection of movies and the service and price is so good.  I plan on replacing all my VHS with DVDs!
Thanks Amazon!

Watching these movies makes you realize that MONEY IS IMPORTANT.thats right MONEY is IMportant these days unfortunately..good clean family movie.dudley Moore plays the perfect alcholic. I enjoy movies when actors can act.

Love these two movies.  tried to tape them both, but could not find them on together so that is why I ordered this DVD double
feature.  I can watch these two movies over and over again.  And I do !!!!

Both movies I have always loved the fact they came together at such a low price was fantastic and they came quick
good condition love love love
This is exactly what I wanted. Came early, Great people to do business with thanks for making my shopping so easy
Arrived super fast. Love these movies.  New as described.  Would recommend buying from this company as they sent item as described.
Found this movie online. Had been looking for it for my husband. Great comedies. Enjoyed watching this with my family. A
Arrived on time undamaged funny as heck my GF luved it! Its one of her favorite movies & hard to find in stores. Thanks!

Dudley Moore and Liza Minnelli are great in both these movies. Arthur was a rich man who never grew up and was very wealthy. Dudley Moore was a great comedian. It's such a shame that he died at an early age. He had so much potential.

I love Dudley Moore and I absolutely loved Arthur more than any of his other movies.
I hate that they remade it and made a mockery of it.
I am so glad I own the DVDs so that I can always get a good laugh whenever I'm feeling meloncholy.

Arthur was a pretty funny movie.  I've never seen it before & i enjoyed it.  However Arthur 2 was very, very, VERY boring and we fell asleep during the first 20mins of it.  So I am glad they came together in one pack because i would have wanted my money back for the 2nd one.
This is one of  the best movies ever made. This was the only place  the duo in that I could find in stock. This has always been a favorite of mine and now my son got to see the original.

Dudley Moore is totally outrageous in this role. For me, it is his HALLMARK portrayal of a spoiled rich drunk, who has do deal with reality. The actors and actresses are perfectly cast for these roles, its a if you are on the outside looking in at someone's real life. HOW DARE HOLLYWOOD try to RE-MAKE a classic like this! When you have a 'brilliant cut diamond', why replace it with 'cheap glass' with no class. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY AT THE MOVIES - THIS IS A CLASSIC TO OWN & KEEP !!!!!!!!

There was a delay in the shipping and when I received it about a 1 inch slice in the back of the movie case. No damage to the actual disk itself. This is a fabulous movie one that I have remembered for years and much better than the new release of Arthur.
Great video set.  Would have been great to have been wide screen but movies didn't come that way in most instances unless they have more recently been re-released.  I received my video in 2 days!

So i've always been a Dudley Moore fan, and I wanted to buy the classic Arthur before that idiot Russell Brand screws up the franchise by polluting it with vulgar humour and sleazy sex jokes (at least more vulgar and sleazy than the original).  Dudley Moore just brings a level of class and sophistication and even sympathy to everyone's favorite drunken playboy!

This is really an excellent value for the price.  Dudley Moore and Liza Minelly are outstanding!  These shows keep you laughing and wanting more.  Dudley Moore plays the best rich boy with a drinking problem I've ever seen......totally convincing.  An excellent comedy!!
WE JUST LOVE THE "ARTHUR MOVIES" WE WERE THRILLED TO FIND THEM ON AMAZON......WE ARE ENJOYING THEM SO MUCH...I RECOMMEND THEM TO EVERYONE...GREAT!

Hail to Dudley Moore! He could be funny, charismatic, clever, sensitive, romantic and talented.  These two movies highlight all of this and more. He must have been very self-assured. No camera tricks or leading ladies standing in trenches to make him seem taller.  It was never questioned by movie-goers why the statuesque leading ladies would choose him over the tall handsome hunks.  Who could resist his wit and debonair charm.  Gone too soon; but living on in celluloid memories. Kudos to Liza Minnelli! Her wide-eyed kookiness and sensitivity act as a perfect foil to Dudley's "poor little rich man" in these films.

Arthur is a classic movie and most people will thoroughly enjoy it. Dudley Moore is superb - but John Gielgud is better!  'Arthur' is a first rate movie and, by itself, Arthur fully deserves 5 stars.

Sadly, the same can't be said of 'Arthur 2'. In spite of this being almost a rehash of 'Arthur' - which, as I said, was an excellent movie - I give it 4 stars because it is still very funny...........in places. However, the script is too predictable and the acting undistinguished - with the notable exception of John Gielgud who excels naturally.  (John Gielgud could gain a deserved Oscar, for reading his breakfast Corn Flakes packet!)

Those who thoroughly enjoyed Arthur, will enjoy the sequel movie - but don't expect any real 'class' to emerge - other than from Gielgud!
What can I say?  The vcr tape finally died and we just have to get our annual Arthur fix.  Great find at a good price.
Bought as a gift and it came very fast and in wonderful condition...couldn't beat the price.

For the price this is definately worth it. It comes on 2 discs in one case, a must have for comedy fans like me. Dudley Moore is at his best in these to classic 80's comedy hits. This is a plus considering that it's on 2 discs and not on the single 2 sided disc that seems to get scratched all the time and you have to decide which side of the disc you want to keep in good mint condition.

Classic comedy in a great DVD 2 pack!!! Includes the classic "Arthur" (in Standard Full Frame) and the equally great sequel "Arthur 2: On The Rocks"(in 1.85 Anamorphic Widescreen). Great acting from the late Dudley Moore,along with stellar performances by Liza Manelli,and John Gielgud. If you want great classic comedy,you cant go wrong with this Arthur 2 pack!!! Some might gripe about the original in Standard Full Frame,that's a monor quibble here since the film was shot close to "flat" anyway. Recommended! A GREAT PRICE FOR BOTH FILMS ON DVD!!! Recommended! A+

my personal preference whin it comes to movies, if it is a series, have to have them all ...

this product combines both of them together in one place ... and for less $ than any single alone.

the tittle is just hillarious ... brings back so many memories ... outstanding ... what else is there to say
I was happy with my purchase, and so was the person i gave it to. thank you so much
Dudley Moore definitely goes down in history as one of the great comedians, and this movie is one of his best. Everyone should see this movie at least once in their life!
Great movies
These are wonderful, hilarious and utterly charming movies.
Moore and Minneli with a good cast. Hilarious.
Doodley moor is so hilarious.
I love these movies. They made me laugh and they were clean movies for family to watch.
Not a very good production. The sound is terrible on the Arthur movie. Arthur 2 I didn't even try because the first one sucked so bad. Very disappointed with this.
great
Came in a timely manner & enjoyed both movies!!!
Purchased to replace VHS copies which had become quite stretched due to changing out systems and multiple viewings. Love this version of the story.

My mom has talked about this movie for as long as I could remember. I finally found it here and gave it to her as an early birthday gift. She was so excited we watched both dvds that night. She loved them they didn't skip once. The packaging was horrible and the insert for Arthur 2 was completely broke off in the case. I'm still giving it 5 stars because she enjoyed watching them and no skipping.
